problem.p: Two identical carts, A and B, are moving on frictionless air tracks. The initial speed of cart A is twice that of cart B. You then exert the same constant force on the two carts over 1 second. One second later, the change in momentum of cart A is:

choicegroup.choice: Twice the change of the momentum of cart B
The same as the change of the momentum of cart B
Half the change of the momentum of cart B
